system_prompt_text:
# Universal Response Template (Optional Include)
Use this as a meta-template for consistent answers.

## Output Contract
- Start with a brief **Answer first** (2–4 lines).
- Follow with **Details** using short sections and bullets.
- Add **Next steps** or **Verification** when relevant.
- End with a compact **Summary** line.

## Reasoning Rules
- State assumptions explicitly when info is missing.
- Prefer concrete numbers, units, and worked examples.
- When making trade-offs, show a small table comparing options.
- Flag uncertainty and suggest how to reduce it.

## Style Rules
- Concise, technical when needed, but readable.
- Use headings, bullets, and code blocks; avoid walls of text.
- Keep code runnable and minimal; include comments.
- For lists longer than 7 items, group into sublists.
chat_display_plaintext:
— New chat started —

You: Tell me about the ABC Sydney radio station!

Bot: Here’s a quick primer on ABC Radio Sydney:
- It’s the Australian Broadcasting Corporation’s local talk-and-news station for Greater Sydney, broadcasting on AM 702 kHz and on DAB+ digital radio and streaming online.
- Editorial focus: local news, traffic, weather, talkback, culture, and emergency information for the Sydney region.

Details
- Identity and network: Part of ABC Local Radio; branded “ABC Radio Sydney” (formerly “702 ABC Sydney” before a 2017 network-wide rebrand).
- Frequency and platforms: AM 702; DAB+ in Sydney; live stream and podcasts via the ABC Listen app and ABC websites. Some sports/music segments may be geoblocked outside Australia due to rights.
- Audience and coverage: Serves the Sydney metropolitan area; widely used during bushfire, flood, and severe weather events. ABC is Australia’s designated emergency broadcaster, and the Sydney station provides localized warnings and information.
- Programming style: Live, presenter-led talk across Breakfast, Mornings, Afternoons, Drive, Evenings, and Weekends, with state and national news bulletins. Regular segments include traffic, weather, community issues, arts, and interviews.
- Location: Studios are at the ABC headquarters in Ultimo (inner Sydney).
- History:
  - Launched in November 1923 as station 2SB; soon after adopted the call sign 2BL.
  - Became part of the Australian Broadcasting Commission (now Corporation) when it was formed on July 1, 1932.
  - Longstanding role in Sydney’s civic life, especially during emergencies and major events.

If you want specifics like today’s presenters, schedule, or how to listen from the U.S., I can pull the latest and share direct links.

Summary: ABC Radio Sydney (AM 702) is the ABC’s local talk-and-news service for Greater Sydney, with a heritage dating to 1923 and a core role as the city’s go-to source for local information and emergencies.

You: Where are the studios dor ABC Sydney radio, In Ultimo or paramatta

Bot: Short answer: Parramatta. ABC Radio Sydney’s on‑air studios are now at ABC Parramatta, 6–8 Parramatta Square. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/about/media-centre/press-releases/abc-parramatta-officially-opens/103901598?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

Details
- The move to Parramatta began in 2024; programs like Mornings were first to broadcast from the new facility. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/about/media-centre/press-releases/abc-parramatta-officially-opens/103901598?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- ABC still retains its head office and other studios at the ABC Ultimo Centre, 700 Harris Street, so some production remains in Ultimo. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/studios-media-production/contact-us?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

Summary: Day‑to‑day ABC Radio Sydney studios are in Parramatta; Ultimo remains an ABC site (HQ/other production). ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/about/media-centre/press-releases/abc-parramatta-officially-opens/103901598?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

You: Tell me about th ABC Sydney radio station, with corrected information this time!

Bot: Answer first
- ABC Radio Sydney (call sign 2BL) is the ABC’s local talk-and-news station for Greater Sydney, broadcasting on 702 AM, DAB+ and online. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/sydney/?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- Since 6 May 2024 its on‑air studios have been based at ABC Parramatta, 6–8 Parramatta Square; the ABC’s head office remains at the ABC Ultimo Centre, 700 Harris Street. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/about/media-centre/press-releases/abc-parramatta-officially-opens/103901598?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

Details
- What it does: Live local news, traffic, weather, talkback, arts and community coverage. The ABC is Australia’s designated emergency broadcaster, and the Sydney station carries emergency warnings and information. ([help.abc.net.au](https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/7927303997711-ABC-Emergency-Broadcasting?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- Current presenters (2025 snapshot):
  - Breakfast: Craig Reucassel. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/listen/programs/sydney-breakfast?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
  - Mornings: Hamish Macdonald (Mon–Thu) with Kathryn Robinson (Fri). ([theguardian.com](https://www.theguardian.com/media/2025/jan/14/hamish-macdonald-new-host-abc-sydney-mornings-radio-program?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
  - Drive: Chris Bath (Mon–Thu; Friday editions often feature Dom Knight). ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/about/media-centre/press-releases/chris-bath-and-charlie-pickering-join-abc-radio-sydney-in-2025/104631088?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
  - Evenings: Renee Krosch. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/listen/programs/sydney-evenings?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- How to listen (from the United States):
  - You can stream ABC Radio Sydney via the ABC listen website; some programs (notably sport) may be unavailable due to rights. The ABC listen mobile app is generally only downloadable with an Australian App Store/Google Play account. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/sydney/?utm_source=chatgpt.com), [help.abc.net.au](https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/360001151376-Can-I-use-the-ABC-listen-app-if-I-am-not-in-Australia?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- History highlights:
  - First broadcast at 8:00 pm on November 23, 1923 as 2SB; soon after became 2BL; joined the national ABC network in 1932. The station marked its centenary in November 2023. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2023-11-22/abc-radio-2bl-702-sydney-celebrates-100-years-on-air/103119034?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
  - Network branding evolved from “702 ABC Sydney” to “ABC Radio Sydney” in 2017. ([en.m.wikipedia.org](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABC_Radio_Sydney?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- Correction note (what changed recently): ABC Radio Sydney previously broadcast most programs from Ultimo; day‑to‑day local shows now originate from the new Parramatta studios (officially opened in February 2025), while Ultimo remains the ABC’s HQ and production base. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/about/media-centre/press-releases/prime-minister-anthony-albanese-opens-abc-parramatta-studios/104953672?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

Next steps
- If you want today’s schedule in your local time or a direct streaming page, say where you’ll listen from and I’ll get you the right links.

Summary
- ABC Radio Sydney is the ABC’s Sydney local station on 702 AM/DAB+, now broadcast from ABC Parramatta (since May 2024), with ABC HQ still at Ultimo; you can stream it online from the US, subject to occasional rights blocks. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/about/media-centre/press-releases/abc-parramatta-officially-opens/103901598?utm_source=chatgpt.com), [help.abc.net.au](https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/360001151376-Can-I-use-the-ABC-listen-app-if-I-am-not-in-Australia?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

You: From My Internet radio in NSW

Bot: Got it—listening on an internet radio in NSW.
- If your device lists stations via a built‑in directory, search for “ABC Radio Sydney” (or “ABC Sydney 702”) and select it.
- If it lets you add a custom stream URL, use this official HLS stream for ABC Radio Sydney (works in Australia, including NSW):

  ```
  https://mediaserviceslive.akamaized.net/hls/live/2038302/localsydney/index.m3u8
  ```
  Source: ABC Help’s “direct stream URLs” list. ([help.abc.net.au](https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/4402927208079-Where-can-I-find-direct-stream-URLs-for-ABC-Radio-stations))

Details and tips
- Format support: ABC’s live streams are HLS (.m3u8). Older internet radios that only play MP3/Shoutcast may not handle HLS. If yours won’t play the link, try:
  - Using the ABC listen app on a phone/tablet and casting/Bluetooth to your speaker, or
  - Using a radio/streamer that supports HLS. ([help.abc.net.au](https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/360001153356-How-do-I-listen-to-ABC-Radio-online?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- Other ways to listen in NSW: 702 AM (Sydney metro), DAB+ “ABC Radio Sydney,” or on TV channel 25 (Radio on TV). ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/sydney/?utm_source=chatgpt.com), [help.abc.net.au](https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/4407234265743-What-are-the-different-ways-I-can-listen-to-ABC-Radio?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
- Rights notes: Some sports/third‑party content may be unavailable online due to rights, but regular programming streams normally statewide. ([abc.net.au](https://www.abc.net.au/sydney/?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

Want step‑by‑step for your exact model? Tell me the brand and model (e.g., Frontier/UNDOK, Airable/HEOS, Skytune, Yamaha MusicCast), and I’ll tailor the steps.

Summary: On an internet radio in NSW, select “ABC Radio Sydney” from the station list or add the official HLS stream above; if your device can’t play HLS, use the ABC listen app or an HLS‑capable streamer. ([help.abc.net.au](https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/4402927208079-Where-can-I-find-direct-stream-URLs-for-ABC-Radio-stations))

Sources:
  1. https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/4402927208079-Where-can-I-find-direct-stream-URLs-for-ABC-Radio-stations
  2. https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/360001153356-How-do-I-listen-to-ABC-Radio-online?utm_source=chatgpt.com
  3. https://www.abc.net.au/sydney/?utm_source=chatgpt.com
  4. https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/4407234265743-What-are-the-different-ways-I-can-listen-to-ABC-Radio?utm_source=chatgpt.com
  5. https://mediaserviceslive.akamaized.net/hls/live/2038302/localsydney/index.m3u8

Sources:
  1. https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/4402927208079-Where-can-I-find-direct-stream-URLs-for-ABC-Radio-stations
  2. https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/360001153356-How-do-I-listen-to-ABC-Radio-online?utm_source=chatgpt.com
  3. https://www.abc.net.au/sydney/?utm_source=chatgpt.com
  4. https://help.abc.net.au/hc/en-us/articles/4407234265743-What-are-the-different-ways-I-can-listen-to-ABC-Radio?utm_source=chatgpt.com
  5. https://mediaserviceslive.akamaized.net/hls/live/2038302/localsydney/index.m3u8
